flavorText: Half the treasure is the glory of finding it.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Ruhm, der mit dem Finden des Schatzes einhergeht, ist bereits die halbe Belohnung.
foreignData.name: Schatzkarte // Schatzbucht
foreignData.text:
(Transformierte Schatzkarte.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {C}.
{T}, opfere einen Schatz: Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: La mitad del tesoro es la gloria de encontrarlo.
foreignData.name: Mapa del tesoro // Caleta del tesoro
foreignData.text:
(Se transforma del Mapa del tesoro.)
{T}: Agrega {C} a tu reserva de maná.
{T}, sacrificar un Tesoro: Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: La gloire de l'avoir trouvé représente déjà la moitié de ce trésor.
foreignData.name: Carte au trésor // Crique au trésor
foreignData.text:
(Transformation de la Carte au trésor.)
{T} : Ajoutez {C} à votre réserve.
{T}, sacrifiez un trésor : Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Metà del valore di un tesoro è la gloria della scoperta.
foreignData.name: Mappa del Tesoro // Baia del Tesoro
foreignData.text:
(Si trasforma dalla Mappa del Tesoro.)
{T}: Aggiungi {C} alla tua riserva di mana.
{T}, Sacrifica un Tesoro: Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 宝物の半分は発見の栄光である。
foreignData.name: 宝物の地図 // 宝物の入り江
foreignData.text:
（宝物の地図から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{C}を加える。
{T}, 宝物１つを生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 그 보물의 절반은 그 보물을 찾았다는 영광이 차지한다.
foreignData.name: 보물 지도 // 보물 만
foreignData.text:
(보물 지도에서 변신함)
{T}: {C}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{T}, 보물 한 개를 희생한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Metade do tesouro é a glória de encontrá-lo.
foreignData.name: Mapa do Tesouro // Angra do Tesouro
foreignData.text:
(Transformação de Mapa do Tesouro.)
{T}: Adicione {C} à sua reserva de mana.
{T}, sacrifique um Tesouro: Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Для отыскавшего клад слава — половина сокровища.
foreignData.name: Карта Сокровищ // БУХТА СОКРОВИЩ
foreignData.text:
(Трансформируется из Карты Сокровищ.)
{T}: добавьте {C} в ваше хранилище маны.
{T}, пожертвуйте Клад: возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 珍宝的价值一半来自找到它的荣耀。
foreignData.name: 藏宝图 // 藏宝海湾
foreignData.text:
（由藏宝图转化。）
{T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。
{T}，牺牲一个珍宝：抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 珍寶的價值一半來自找到它的榮耀。
foreignData.name: 藏寶圖 // 藏寶海灣
foreignData.text:
（由藏寶圖轉化。）
{T}：加{C}到你的魔法力池中。
{T}，犧牲一個珍寶：抽一張牌。

name: Treasure Map // Treasure Cove
originalText:
(Transforms from Treasure Map.)
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

rulings.text: If a third landmark counter is put on Treasure Map by something other than the resolution of its first ability (as modified by any applicable replacement effects), you won’t remove those counters, transform Treasure Map, or get Treasures yet. You’ll have to wait until you activate its first ability again.

If Treasure Map leaves the battlefield before its ability resolves, you can’t put a landmark counter on it. However, if it somehow already had three landmark counters on it before it left the battlefield, you’ll get three Treasures.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

text:
